name: mova_template_coffee_example
description: Example case: turning a coffee-making description into a structured procedure.

input.description: Brew morning coffee in a cezve.

expected_procedure.title: Brew morning coffee in a cezve

steps.label: Prepare the cezve and coffee
steps.description: Ensure the cezve is clean and prepare the required amount of ground coffee.

steps.label: Pour water
steps.description: Add cold water to the cezve at the needed volume.

steps.label: Add coffee
steps.description: Add ground coffee to the water and mix gently.

steps.label: Heat until foam rises
steps.description: Place the cezve on low heat and warm until the foam starts to rise.

steps.label: Remove from heat and serve
steps.description: Remove the cezve before boiling, let the coffee settle briefly, and pour into a cup.
